div.p: Update 04/20/2020 - If you have any questions regarding the Coronavirus, please email us at coronavirus@sd194.org
Home learning packets are now available online, or can be picked up from the Administrative Center 8:00am - 10:00am on the following dates: April 21st, 23rd, 27th, and 30th.

a.span: Remote Learning Plan - What this change means

br.br: are now available online, or they can be picked up from the Administration Center from 8:00am - 10:00am on the following dates:

div.center: Our Grab and Go breakfasts and lunches can be picked up from the Administration Center from 8:00am - 10:00am on the following dates:

Food distribution will be done twice a week and will include enough breakfasts and lunches for the entire week.
Coronavirus Resources
Please click on the links below for the latest Coronavirus updates.

br.span:
If you know anyone who is experiencing any Coronavirus symptoms please contact the Illinois Department of Public Health
Coronavirus Hotline 800-889-3931 or dph.sick@illinois.gov

div.p: Event will take place at Columbia Central.

section.div: Informational evening for parents of Incoming Kindergarten students for 2020-2021 school year.
